typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Code } as string,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(isNull({Code }),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(stream1, Stream2)
ConditionalSplit1@Stream2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{Code },
		Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
